metadata.name: Rhapsody in Hue
metadata.description:
The bliss of all things moving in harmonious alignment. I dance between the realms of the material and the spirit as I wield our novel command of electric light. This space can only be unlocked through the RGB of the CRT. My favorite color has always been all of them all at once.

A Signature VideoFeeling by Sarah Zucker / @thesarahshow. Created in studio with original animation, video feedback and analog processing on VHS. Filmed in 4K from vintage CRT TV Screen.

Vidfeel Token #1. Single Edition, 2022.
